headline: The Sherwin-Williams Company (SHW): A Leading Name in Materials Dividends for Investors
summary: The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) is included among the 13 Best Materials Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) runs one of the largest networks of company-owned specialty paint stores in North America. headline: Sherwin-Williams 2026 Colormix® Trend Forecast Anthology Volume Two Explores the Evolution of Color Families in Upcoming Design Trends
summary: The Sherwin-Williams Company today announces its 2026 Colormix® Trend Forecast Anthology Volume Two, the second iteration of its biennial approach to the annual color trend report, highly sought after by designers. This iteration will focus on color evolution and will dive deeper into the evolution of specific color families that will shape the future of design.
